items.title: Anker’s eufy S350 indoor security cam with a 360-degree view and AI tracking drops back to $100 (Reg. $140)
items.summary:
Through its official eufy Amazon storefront, Anker is offering its S350 Security Indoor Cam back down at $99.99 shipped. Normally going for $140 at full price, this is the most repeated deal we’ve seen on this camera over 2025, often coming in once a month. While we have seen it go as low as $80 in the past (once during the most recent Prime Day event), if you missed out three weeks ago, you’re getting the next-best price since mid-July that we have tracked. You’ll be upgrading your interior security with a 29% markdown that cuts $40 off the going rate, landing it at the fourth-lowest overall price.

items.title: Score an exclusive $1,750 savings on Jackery’s Explorer 3000 V2 solar bundle with 2x 200W panels at a new $1,249 low
items.summary:
We’ve secured an exclusive deal on the Jackery Explorer 3000 V2 (HomePower 3000) Portable Power Station bundled with two 200W solar panels at $1,249 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5BFJACK at checkout. This solar-expanded package usually goes for $2,999 in full, which we’ve seen regularly keeping down at $1,599 since mid-September, and has only gone as low as $1,499 up until today. It’s starting off with an initial price cut to that $1,499 rate that we only saw once before during Prime Day, with the exclusive bonus savings taking things lower than ever with a combined $1,750 markdown to a new all-time low price.

items.title: Anker’s 9,600mAh Prime Power Bank w/ display doubles as a wall charger back at $59 Prime Day price
items.summary:
As we reported previously, Anker launched a notable Halloween sale that just got even better with prices dropping across the board on several of its newest and best Prime charging gear. Those include its 25W Qi2.2 3-in-1 MagSafe Charging Stand as well as the Prime 200W 6-port USB-C GaN charging station, but we are also seeing one of my personal favorite releases in the lineup back down at Prime Day pricing – the Anker 9,600mAh Prime Power Bank down at just under $59 shipped.

items.title: Anker’s compact 11-in-1 surge protector with 20W USB-C is back down to $20 (Save 23%)
items.summary:
Anker 11-in-1 20W USB-C Surge Protector

Buy for $20 (Reg. $26)

What we love

Despite it’s compact 4.5 by 3.6 by 1.6 inch size, this Anker surge protector wields a total of 11 outputs. You’re looking at 8 AC, two USB-A, and one 20W Type-C. One of the features I like most are the sideways outlets that offer up yet another orientation for you to plug in bulky adapters.

items.title: adidas early Black Friday Week of Deals sale now live, up to 50% off all your favorites
items.summary:
The adidas Week of Deals sale is live now with up to 50% off sitewide until November 5th. Our top pick has to be the rarely on sale Ultraboost 1.0. These kicks offer energy-returning tech that lets you run mile after mile in total comfort. They deliver traction, flexibility, and cushioning while keeping your feet supported. Plus, they look just as good on the street as they do on your run or at the gym. Score huge deals on all your adidas essentials, perfect for treating yourself or getting a jump on holiday shopping while saving big. Shop the entire sale here.

items.title: Keep surprise winter weight gains at bay with this Apple Health-ready smart scale, now $20 (Save 26%)
items.summary:
RENPHO Apple Health Smart Scale

Buy for $20 (Reg. $27)

What we love

Truth be told, last winter I gained around 15 pounds. When I saw that in the spring, I started using my smart scale and Apple Health app to keep tabs on my weight over the following months. Thankfully I shed most of that. If you want to keep an eye on flucations, a scale like this with Apple Health integration is a solid way to go if you ask me.
